Pre-Game Insights: The New York Mets are aiming to end a four-game road skid when they face the Milwaukee Brewers.
Milwaukee is 46-33 in home games and 92-68 overall, with a strong record when scoring five or more runs.
New York is 87-71 overall and 41-36 in road games, with a good on-base percentage.
The Brewers lead the season series 4-0.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jose Quintana and Jared Koenig are the probable starting pitchers.
The betting line and over/under are mentioned.
Injuries for both teams are noted.
Others: Key players like William Contreras and Francisco Lindor are highlighted.
